translation.en: [woman] Christmas is almost here.
translation.zh: 圣诞节即将来临

translation.en: And after that day, I know my life will never be the same.
translation.zh: 那天之后我知道自己的人生会就此改变

translation.en: I'm a little scared.
translation.zh: 我有点害怕

translation.en: Well, to be honest, a lot scared.
translation.zh: 老实说 是非常害怕

translation.en: What will happen to me, to us?
translation.zh: 我和我们会怎么样呢？

translation.en: And then there's little Jacob.
translation.zh: 还有小雅各布

translation.en: What about him?
translation.zh: 他会怎样？

translation.en: I just hope he'll be okay.
translation.zh: 我只希望他好起来

translation.en: -[fan] There he is! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 他来了！

translation.en: How's everybody doing? See you in there. Thanks for coming.
translation.zh: 各位都好吗？里面见 谢谢大家过来

translation.en: In Book Five, will we finally learn the truth about Camille?
translation.zh: 第五本书里我们终于能知道卡米尔的真相了吗？

translation.en: Is she part of the French Resistance like she says?
translation.zh: 她真的像自己说的那样是个法国抵抗运动成员吗？

translation.en: Or is she really a Nazi spy? You know, I've been going back and forth on that one.
translation.zh: -还是说她其实是个纳粹间谍？-我一直在犹豫呢

translation.en: [gasps] Make her a heroine! Oh, it's so much more romantic.
translation.zh: 让她成为女英雄吧 那样会更浪漫

translation.en: -Yeah… -Then again, a spy is sexier.
translation.zh: 而且 间谍更性感

translation.en: Hmm! You know what? -[whispers] Double agent. -[fan exclaims]
translation.zh: 你知道吗？双面间谍

translation.en: Could you inscribe it to Sherri, please? I'm Sherri.
translation.zh: 能请你写上“致雪莉”吗？我是雪莉

translation.en: So is it an "I" or a "Y"?
translation.zh: 是“莉”还是“丽”？

translation.en: Either is fine.
translation.zh: 都可以

translation.en: You recognize me, non? Book Three.
translation.zh: 你认得我吗？第三本书

translation.en: [in French] Of course, of course! Camille Toussaint. How are you?
translation.zh: 当然啦！卡米尔·图森！最近怎么样？

translation.en: Very well, sir. Very well.
translation.zh: 非常好 先生 非常好

translation.en: Merry Christmas, Camille.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 卡米尔

translation.en: Thank you so much!
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: [in English] Make it out to Todd and Mark. Sure.
translation.zh: -你能写上致托德和马克吗？-当然可以

translation.en: Oh, make that Mark and Todd. I read the book first.
translation.zh: 还是写马克和托德吧我先看的那本书

translation.en: [Todd] No way. Don't you remember? Your sister gave it to me.
translation.zh: 你忘记了吗？是你姐姐送给我的

translation.en: -No, your sister gave it to me-- -[Jacob] Tell you what, fellas.
translation.zh: -不 是你姐姐给我…-听我说 伙计们

translation.en: You know what I'm gonna do? I'm gonna go ahead and sign two books. One for each of you, okay?
translation.zh: 我签两本书 你们每人一本 好吗？

translation.en: My treat. There you go.
translation.zh: 算我的 可以了

translation.en: So, are you staying in the city for the holidays?
translation.zh: 你会在城里过节吗？

translation.en: I'm afraid not. -Gotta get home to my girl, Ava. -Oh.
translation.zh: 恐怕不会 我得回家看我女儿艾娃

translation.en: I didn't know that you were…
translation.zh: 我不知道你已经…

translation.en: Well, she's a very lucky woman.
translation.zh: 她真是个非常幸运的女人

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: -圣诞快乐-圣诞快乐

translation.en: Ava, hon, I'm home!
translation.zh: 艾娃 宝贝 我回家了

translation.en: Ava?
translation.zh: 艾娃？

translation.en: -[whines and barks] -Come here! Come here, baby. What's up? How are you? Come here! Hi! Hi!
translation.zh: 过来！来这里 宝贝怎么样？你好吗？过来！嗨！

translation.en: -Welcome home, Mr. Jacob. -Oh, thanks, Svet. Thanks.
translation.zh: -欢迎回家 雅各布先生-谢谢你 斯维特

translation.en: [Jacob] Hi, how are you? Hello!
translation.zh: 嗨 你好吗？你好！

translation.en: -Everything under control? Yeah? -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 一切都正常吗？还好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. Refrigerator is full. Ava has bath. -Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh: -对 冰箱补齐了 艾娃洗了澡-好的

translation.en: I bring in extra firewood.
translation.zh: 我还拿来了额外的柴火

translation.en: Oh, and, uh, fan mail.
translation.zh: 还有粉丝来信

translation.en: [laughs] More even than last book, I think.
translation.zh: 比上一本书的还要多

translation.en: Wow. Okay, fan mail. Look at that.
translation.zh: 哇 粉丝来信 你看看

translation.en: Now I know what I'm doing for the next couple weeks, right?
translation.zh: 我知道接下来几周要做什么了

translation.en: Thank you for holding down the fort while I was gone.
translation.zh: 谢谢你在我离开期间照看这里

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -Oh, I almost forgot.
translation.zh: 我差点忘了

translation.en: -This, Svetlana, is for you. -Oh!
translation.zh: 斯维特拉娜 这是给你的

translation.en: Happy holidays.
translation.zh: 节日快乐

translation.en: -And, you know, thank you for everything. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你做的一切-谢谢

translation.en: You're gonna be okay, Mr. Jacob?
translation.zh: 你会好好的吧 雅各布先生？

translation.en: Okay? Yeah, what do you mean? It's me. Of course. I'm always okay.
translation.zh: 好？什么意思？我就这样 一直都挺好的

translation.en: But also always alone.
translation.zh: 但也总是一个人

translation.en: I'm alone because I prefer it that way, you know that. Besides, I'm not alone.
translation.zh: 我一个人是因为我更喜欢那样 再说了 我有最好的女儿艾娃它会陪着我

translation.en: I got my best girl here, Ava. She'll keep me company.
translation.zh: 再说了 我有最好的女儿艾娃它会陪着我

translation.en: -See you next year, Mr. Jacob. -Yeah! See you, you know…
translation.zh: -明年见 雅各布先生-好的 再见 你懂的…

translation.en: Ava! [clicks tongue] Come here.
translation.zh: 艾娃 过来

translation.en: Let's, uh, see what we got here.
translation.zh: 我们看看有什么节目

translation.en: -[jazz music playing on radio] -Ah, there we go. All right.
translation.zh: 好了 好吧

translation.en: I could get down with that. That's good. That is good.
translation.zh: 很好 很好

translation.en: -Hello? -[man] Hi, is this, uh, Jacob Turner?
translation.zh: -喂？-嗨 您是雅各布·特纳吗？

translation.en: Yeah, this is,
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: but, you know, I don't need my carpets cleaned, or a home loan, or--
translation.zh: 我不需要清理地毯或家庭贷款…

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, Mr. Turner, apologies. I was, uh… hesitant to leave a message.
translation.zh: 好的 特纳先生 抱歉我本来犹豫要不要留言的

translation.en: My name is Matt Segreto. I'm an attorney--
translation.zh: 我叫马特·塞格雷托 是一名律师…

translation.en: Oh, let me guess. You have a client who claims I stole one of their ideas.
translation.zh: 让我猜猜 你有个客户说我偷了他们的想法

translation.en: No, um…
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I'm the executor of your mother's estate.
translation.zh: 我是你母亲遗产的执行人

translation.en: I'm sorry. You're, uh… What was that?
translation.zh: 对不起 你是…什么来着？

translation.en: I really am sorry to be the one to tell you. Uh…
translation.zh: 很抱歉由我来告诉你

translation.en: She passed last week.
translation.zh: 她上周去世了

translation.en: I thought you knew.
translation.zh: 我以为你已经知晓

translation.en: No, I… I didn't know that.
translation.zh: 不 我不知道

translation.en: [Jacob] My mother and I hadn't spoken in a long time.
translation.zh: 我妈妈已经很久没和我说过话了

translation.en: Our relationship was, uh…
translation.zh: 我们的关系

translation.en: complicated.
translation.zh: 很复杂

translation.en: [Matt on phone] I understand.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: She left everything to you, um, her house and all her furnishings.
translation.zh: 她把一切都留给你了包括她的房子和家具

translation.en: There's some paperwork that needs to be signed.
translation.zh: 有些文件需要你签署

translation.en: Um, I can arrange to meet you in Bridgeport one day next week,
translation.zh: 我可以下周和你在布里奇波特见面

translation.en: if that's convenient.
translation.zh: 看你方便不方便

translation.en: -[Matt] Mr. Turner. -Hey!
translation.zh: -特纳先生-喂

translation.en: Matt Segreto.
translation.zh: 马特·塞格雷托

translation.en: -Thanks for meeting me out here. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 谢谢你来见我

translation.en: -I'm so sorry for your loss. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -节哀顺变-谢谢

translation.en: Place must bring back a lot of memories.
translation.zh: 这个地方一定让你想起很多往事

translation.en: You have no idea.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛

translation.en: -[Jacob] You just, uh… -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你来…-好

translation.en: [Jacob] Careful.
translation.zh: 小心

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Yeah, neighbors said she rarely left the house.
translation.zh: 邻居说她很少出门

translation.en: And when they dropped by, she never let them in.
translation.zh: 他们路过的时候她从来不邀请人家进来

translation.en: Now I know why.
translation.zh: 现在我知道原因了

translation.en: Should be a piano hiding over here somewhere.
translation.zh: 这边应该有台钢琴

translation.en: Um, yep. According to the inventory, it's a Steinway Model S, 1940.
translation.zh: 对 根据清单显示这是一台1940年的施坦威S型

translation.en: It's worth about 40 grand.
translation.zh: 大概价值四万美元

translation.en: From the look of things, you're gonna be doing a lot of trash runs.
translation.zh: 乍一看 你得丢掉不少东西

translation.en: Do you want me to get a dumpster rental for you?
translation.zh: 要我帮你租辆垃圾车吗？

translation.en: Oh, uh… Yeah. -Thanks. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 谢谢-好

translation.en: And, um, Mr. Turner…
translation.zh: 还有 特纳先生…

translation.en: Jake. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 杰克

translation.en: I hate to bother you, but my wife is just a huge fan, and, um…
translation.zh: 我不想麻烦你但我太太是你的忠实粉丝…

translation.en: Okay. [clears throat]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You know, us Regular Joes can never really live up to the super-suave dudes in your books. [laughs]
translation.zh: 像我们这种普通人永远没法像你书里人物那样温文尔雅

translation.en: Those dudes aren't real, Matt.
translation.zh: 那些家伙又不是真的 马特

translation.en: Yeah, tell that to my wife.
translation.zh: 是啊 去跟我的老婆说吧

translation.en: Her name's Mercedes.
translation.zh: 她的名字叫梅赛德斯

translation.en: Like the car.
translation.zh: 跟车同名

translation.en: [chuckles] Right. -Here you go. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -哇 好 给你-谢谢

translation.en: Come on, babe.
translation.zh: 走吧 宝贝

translation.en: All right, you ready? Hop on up.
translation.zh: 好了 准备好了？上车

translation.en: Good girl.
translation.zh: 乖女儿

translation.en: Simply exquisite.
translation.zh: 真是太好听了

translation.en: Ellie, is that you?
translation.zh: 埃莉 是你吗？

translation.en: Jacob, you came!
translation.zh: 雅各布 你回来了

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I don't know, somehow I assumed that you'd send an assistant or someone,
translation.zh: 我都不知道还以为你会派个助理或者谁回来

translation.en: I guess because you're so famous now.
translation.zh: 毕竟你现在那么有名

translation.en: No, some things you gotta do on your own. So good to see you. You look great.
translation.zh: 有些事必须自己做很高兴见到你 你看起来很棒

translation.en: You too. It's been a long time. What, it's 20 years, probably?
translation.zh: 你也是 好久不见 大概有20年了吧

translation.en: -You were about 18 when you left. -17 when I left.
translation.zh: -你离开的时候大概18岁-我离开的时候17岁

translation.en: [Ellie] That was a really tough time for you.
translation.zh: 当时你真的过得太不容易了

translation.en: [Jacob] Yeah, it was.
translation.zh: 是 没错

translation.en: But, you know, I always knew you'd be a writer.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会成为作家

translation.en: You were an interesting kid.
translation.zh: 你是个有趣的孩子

translation.en: You had a wonderful imagination, and you loved words.
translation.zh: 你的想象力很奇妙 你喜欢文字

translation.en: I remember sitting in your den for hours, playing online Scrabble.
translation.zh: 我记得曾在你家书房坐了几个小时一直玩在线拼字游戏

translation.en: Oh, whenever your mom had a really bad day.
translation.zh: 都是你妈心情抑郁的时候

translation.en: Mom had a lot of bad days, didn't she? She was never the same.
translation.zh: -我妈当时经常心情抑郁 是吧？-她和以前不一样了

translation.en: [Jacob] None of us were.
translation.zh: 我们也不一样了

translation.en: -They're good! -[Ellie laughs]
translation.zh: 他们真不错

translation.en: -Oh, wonderful. -[Jacob] That's sweet. Thank you.
translation.zh: -太好了-太好了 谢谢

translation.en: -[Ellie] Bye-bye now. -Bye.
translation.zh: -那就再见了-再见

translation.en: Hey, are you still painting?
translation.zh: 你还在画画吗？

translation.en: You might as well ask if I'm still breathing.
translation.zh: 不如问我是否还在呼吸

translation.en: Listen, I'm glad I ran into you. It's good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴遇到你 能看到你真好

translation.en: I'm about ready to take off. I gotta, um…
translation.zh: 我准备要离开了 我…

translation.en: I gotta come back tomorrow and tackle another room.
translation.zh: 我明天还会回来 整理另一个房间

translation.en: It's gotta be really, really hard going through all her stuff.
translation.zh: 要整理出她的所有东西一定很辛苦

translation.en: Yeah. What was it that Robert Frost always said?
translation.zh: 对 罗伯特·弗罗斯特有一句话怎么说的来着？

translation.en: He said, "The best way out is always through," right?
translation.zh: 他说：“最好的出路永远都是勇往直前” 对吗？

translation.en: Although I'm pretty sure he never met a hoarder.
translation.zh: 但我很肯定他没遇见过囤货控

translation.en: I would imagine not.
translation.zh: 我猜也是

translation.en: [Jacob] It's lonely out here.
translation.zh: 这里好寂寞

translation.en: And I miss you.
translation.zh: 我想你

translation.en: Oh, God! Oh, come on!
translation.zh: 天啊！快点！

translation.en: Oh, come on, Mom, really?
translation.zh: 拜托 妈妈 非要这样吗？

translation.en: -What? -[Ava whines]
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Still like a grilled cheese with tomato soup?
translation.zh: 你还喜欢烤芝士三明治配番茄汤吗？

translation.en: I figured you'd probably worked up a pretty good appetite by now.
translation.zh: 我猜你整理一番后 胃口一定不错

translation.en: You kidding? I'm starving.
translation.zh: 开玩笑吧？我快饿死了

translation.en: -Does she like tomato soup? Is this okay? -She loves it. Yeah. Yeah, it's great.
translation.zh: -它喜欢番茄汤吗？这个可以吗？-它很喜欢 可以 麻烦了

translation.en: [Ellie] Oh, there you go.
translation.zh: 来了

translation.en: -Oh, she does! -Look at that!
translation.zh: -它喜欢！-看啊！

translation.en: We don't know how to thank you. Do we, Ava?
translation.zh: 我们不知道该怎么感谢你是不是 艾娃？

translation.en: -You could put me in your next novel. -Whoa, whoa, hold on a second.
translation.zh: 把我写进你的下一本小说里 哇 等一下 你真的读过我的小说？

translation.en: You actually read my novels?
translation.zh: 哇 等一下 你真的读过我的小说？

translation.en: I'm probably the only one of your readers who can recognize some of the characters.
translation.zh: 我可能是你的读者里唯一能认出一些人物的人

translation.en: Like whom, for instance?
translation.zh: 比如谁呢？

translation.en: -Well, in Green Eyes. -Green Eyes of Paris.
translation.zh: -嗯 《绿眼》里-《巴黎绿眼》

translation.en: Yeah, the photographer.
translation.zh: 对 那个摄影师

translation.en: Beautiful, strong woman who has a breakdown.
translation.zh: 那个崩溃的美丽坚强的女人

translation.en: Well, that one's pretty obvious, though, right?
translation.zh: 但那个很明显对吧？

translation.en: There's another character I recognize, you know, in The Final Midnight.
translation.zh: 我还在《最后的午夜》里认出了另一个角色

translation.en: The father of the soldier.
translation.zh: 那个士兵的父亲

translation.en: Very minor character, though. Sort of like in real life.
translation.zh: 非常小的角色有点像现实生活中的人物

translation.en: Your memories of him can't be all that bad if you're still wearing his watch.
translation.zh: 你对他的回忆不可能全是不好的毕竟你还戴着他的手表

translation.en: He came to your mother's funeral. Did you know that?
translation.zh: 他来参加了你母亲的丧礼你知道吗？

translation.en: To pay his respects, but I'm pretty sure he was hoping to see you there.
translation.zh: 说是为了吊唁但我肯定他是希望在这里见到你

translation.en: No, I don't…
translation.zh: 不 我不…

translation.en: I don't think so, no.
translation.zh: 我不这么觉得

translation.en: And the funeral… the funeral, I feel…
translation.zh: 那个葬礼 我感觉…

translation.en: It's understandable, but it doesn't matter anymore.
translation.zh: 可以理解 但也没关系

translation.en: That was then. This is now.
translation.zh: 都是之前的事情了 现在是现在

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[Ellie] And can I ask you a question? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我能问你一个问题吗？-好

translation.en: -It's personal. -Sure.
translation.zh: -是件私事-好

translation.en: Am I too old for this?
translation.zh: 我对这个来说是不是太老了？

translation.en: [Jake laughs] Are-- -This is your question? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你是…这就是你的问题？-对

translation.en: No! No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Seriously? -This is perfect.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-太适合了

translation.en: Have you tried one of these? Of course not. Why would you?
translation.zh: 你试过这些吗？当然没有 你怎么会用？

translation.en: You got women linin' up on your doorstep.
translation.zh: 你家门口的女人都得排队了

translation.en: [laughing] I do not have women lining up on my doorstep.
translation.zh: 我家门口才没有女人排队

translation.en: I see those magazines at the supermarket. You date movie stars.
translation.zh: 我在超市读过那些杂志你和电影明星们约会

translation.en: [laughing] All right. Listen, they will print anything.
translation.zh: 听着 他们都是乱写

translation.en: But the answer to your question, no, I have not tried a dating app,
translation.zh: 我好好回答你的问题我没有试过约会应用

translation.en: but I think you absolutely should.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你绝对该试试

translation.en: I have to write something.
translation.zh: 我必须得写点什么

translation.en: -Dating profile? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -交友资料？-对

translation.en: I know a writer. May I?
translation.zh: 我认识一个作家 我来吧？

translation.en: -You're gonna write my profile? Oh! -It would be my pleasure.
translation.zh: -你要帮我写个人资料？-这是我的荣幸

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Come on in, Ellie. Door's open.
translation.zh: 进来吧 埃莉 门开着

translation.en: -Hello? -You're not Ellie.
translation.zh: 你好？ 不是埃莉

translation.en: Uh, no. No, I'm not.
translation.zh: 不 我不是

translation.en: No, it's just-- I thought you were my neighbor. Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: -不 我刚以为你是我的邻居-抱歉

translation.en: You were here before, right? -You were across the street? -Yeah. Yeah, that was me.
translation.zh: -你之前来过这里 在街对面是吗？-对 是我

translation.en: I'm not some kind of weird stalker or anything, if that's what you're thinking.
translation.zh: 我不是什么奇怪的跟踪狂你别那么想

translation.en: No, I didn't think you were. Could you close the door behind you?
translation.zh: 我没觉得你是你能关上后面的门吗？

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Yeah, of course. Yeah, um…
translation.zh: 当然可以 好

translation.en: What can I do for you? -[Ava whines] -Hey. He's cute. Good boy.
translation.zh: -有什么事吗？-嘿 它很可爱 好小子

translation.en: Girl, actually. That's Ava.
translation.zh: 其实它是个女孩 那是艾娃

translation.en: -Cool name. Hey, Ava. -[whines]
translation.zh: 很酷的名字 嘿 艾娃

translation.en: This is the Turner residence, right?
translation.zh: 这里是特纳家 对吧？

translation.en: [sighs] Sort of. Sort of. Uh, I'm Jake Turner.
translation.zh: 算是吧 我是杰克·特纳

translation.en: Great. Nice to meet you, Mr. Turner.
translation.zh: 很好 很高兴认识你 特纳先生

translation.en: My name's Rachel Campbell. And the reason I'm here…
translation.zh: 我叫瑞秋·坎贝尔我来这里的原因…

translation.en: Sorry, this is a little complicated, but I'm trying to find my mother.
translation.zh: 对不起 稍微有点复杂但我是试着来寻找母亲的

translation.en: And I think you might be able to help me.
translation.zh: 或许你能帮助到我

translation.en: She used to live here a long time ago, I think. I hope.
translation.zh: 她很久以前应该住在这里我希望如此

translation.en: Your mother lived here in this house?
translation.zh: 你母亲在这房子里住过？

translation.en: Yeah, um, when I was born… Rather, right before I was born, she lived…
translation.zh: 没错 我刚出生…其实 是在我出生之前

translation.en: This is Scott and Lois Turner's house, right?
translation.zh: 这里是斯科特和洛伊斯·特纳的家？

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, well, yeah. My parents.
translation.zh: 对 他们是我的父母

translation.en: Great. So, yeah, my birth mother, she lived here and she worked for them.
translation.zh: 很好 我的生母就住在这里为他们工作

translation.en: Your mother worked for my parents?
translation.zh: 她给我爸妈工作？

translation.en: From what I can tell, she was actually their nanny.
translation.zh: 据我所知 她应该是他们的保姆

translation.en: Whoa! No! Oh, whoa, whoa! No, no, no! Okay, hold on! Hold--
translation.zh: 哇！不 好的 等一下 等等…

translation.en: Ow! That's hot.
translation.zh: 有点烫

translation.en: You need a hand? [chuckling] No, no, it's… -I got it under control. -Okay.
translation.zh: -要搭把手吗？-不 我有数的

translation.en: -[Jacob] Ah, forget it. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好 -算了-好

translation.en: So what brings Nancy Drew to the Turner house, anyway?
translation.zh: 是什么风把神探南希吹到特纳家来了？

translation.en: -If you don't mind me asking. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 如果你不介意我这么问的话

translation.en: It wasn't easy. My adoption file was sealed.
translation.zh: 过程不容易 我的收养档案被密封了

translation.en: But a friend of mine worked for the Connecticut Records Department.
translation.zh: 有个在康涅狄格州档案馆工作的朋友

translation.en: By law, he couldn't tell me my mom's name,
translation.zh: 根据法律 他不能说出我母亲的姓名

translation.en: but he could tell me her last known address which was here, so…
translation.zh: 但是他能告诉我她最后的地址就是这里

translation.en: I understand, but I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I…
translation.zh: 我明白 但我很抱歉

translation.en: I was just about ready to head out. I wish I could help you.
translation.zh: 我现在正要出门 希望我能帮到你

translation.en: -I don't think I can, though. -No, I totally understand.
translation.zh: -但我觉得自己做不到-我明白

translation.en: I guess I just gotta learn to leave the table.
translation.zh: 我得学会放手

translation.en: Nina Simone.
translation.zh: 妮娜·西蒙的歌

translation.en: That's right. Yeah, she's the best.
translation.zh: 没错 对 她最棒了

translation.en: -One of your favorites? -She is.
translation.zh: -你最喜欢的歌手之一？-是的

translation.en: -You got any others? -Uh, Peggy Lee, Ella, Lady Day.
translation.zh: -你还喜欢其他人吗？-佩琪·李 艾拉 戴夫人

translation.en: -Aretha. -Mmm. Oh, don't forget about Gladys.
translation.zh: -阿蕾莎-别忘了格拉迪丝

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, Gladys the Baddest. My dad…
translation.zh: 格拉迪丝最牛了 我爸…

translation.en: He was my own personal musicologist, taught me everybody.
translation.zh: 他对我来说是个音乐学家是他让我认识了这些人

translation.en: Like Little Richard, Marvin Gaye.
translation.zh: 小理查德 马文·盖伊

translation.en: -Marvin. We lost him when I was a kid. -'84.
translation.zh: -马文 我还是个孩子时他就走了-1984年

translation.en: -Yeah. Yep. -You in music or something?
translation.zh: 对 对 -你是做音乐的吗？-不 我是…

translation.en: No. No, no, I'm a…
translation.zh: -你是做音乐的吗？-不 我是…

translation.en: -I write a little bit. -Really? Cool! Anything I know?
translation.zh: -我写点东西-真的吗？酷 有我知道的吗？

translation.en: Uh… You know, no, probably not.
translation.zh: 我…不 可能没有

translation.en: -No? Anything I'd like? -No. No, probably not. [laughs]
translation.zh: -没有？有什么我喜欢的吗？-不 可能没有

translation.en: -Struggling artist? I get it. -Ah…
translation.zh: 挣扎的艺术家？我懂

translation.en: Well, I guess we're all struggling in one way or another, huh?
translation.zh: 看来我们都在苦苦挣扎吧？

translation.en: Ain't that the truth.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry I couldn't help you with your mom. Yeah. Don't apologize.
translation.zh: -很抱歉 我无法回答你的问题-好 不用道歉

translation.en: Honestly, just being in the house where she once lived makes me feel…
translation.zh: 老实说 出现在她曾经住过的屋子已经让我觉得…

translation.en: I don't know… [sighs] …more connected to her somehow.
translation.zh: 我不知道 和她更近了一些

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-是

translation.en: Anyway, thanks.
translation.zh: 总之 谢谢你

translation.en: -Um, thank you. Yeah. -Oh.
translation.zh: 谢谢 对

translation.en: Oops. [laughs] Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 糟糕 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Merry Christmas to you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -祝你圣诞快乐-谢谢

translation.en: -[Jacob] Wait, Ellie. Wait-- Rachel! -[car driving off]
translation.zh: 等等 埃莉… 等等…瑞秋

translation.en: Rachel, wait!
translation.zh: 瑞秋 等等！

translation.en: I have an idea.
translation.zh: 我想起来一件事

translation.en: Thing is, my neighbor's been living here for years, and I was thinking she…
translation.zh: 我的邻居在这里住了很多年我觉得她…

translation.en: [Ellie chuckling] I feel the same way.
translation.zh: 我也这么觉得

translation.en: Well, that was quick.
translation.zh: 好吧 还挺快

translation.en: [Rachel] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Uh, nothing. I'll explain later.
translation.zh: 没什么 我稍后再解释

translation.en: Listen, why don't I, um, give you my phone number? And then you can just text me tomorrow.
translation.zh: 不如我把电话号码留给你这样你明天就可以给我发信息了

translation.en: -I'm sure I'll have spoken to her by then. -Oh, that would be great.
translation.zh: -到时候我会跟她说的-那就太好了

translation.en: Actually, you know what? Um… I think I might just wait until she's back.
translation.zh: 其实 我想我还是等她回来吧

translation.en: -I'll wait in my car. -You sure? She might be a while.
translation.zh: -我在车里等-你确定吗？她可能需要一会儿

translation.en: -I've come this far, so… -Okay.
translation.zh: -反正已经走到这了 所以…-好

translation.en: -Okay. -Yup.
translation.zh: -好-对

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Are you hungry? I was gonna grab a bite, if you're hungry.
translation.zh: 你饿吗？我准备去找点吃的你要饿的话一起吧

translation.en: -[Rachel] Very cool. -Mmm-hmm. -So is this an old haunt or… -No.
translation.zh: 好酷啊 所以这里是你的据点还是…？

translation.en: I haven't been here in years, actually,
translation.zh: 不 我已经离开这里好多年了

translation.en: but my mom used to take me here a lot when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 但我小时候 妈妈带我来过好多次

translation.en: -She loved this place. -I can see why. It's nice.
translation.zh: -她喜欢这个地方-我能理解她 真好

translation.en: -Welcome to Trattoria Toscana. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -欢迎来到托斯卡纳餐厅-谢谢

translation.en: I am Vittorio. May I share tonight's specials?
translation.zh: 我是维托里奥要我介绍下今晚的特色菜吗？

translation.en: [in English] Could you repeat in English?
translation.zh: 你能用英语重复一下特色菜吗？

translation.en: No, no, it's… it's fine. I'll just have whatever she's having.
translation.zh: 不 没关系 我跟她点一样的就行

translation.en: -Ah. -Oh, and a glass of wine, please.
translation.zh: 请给我一杯酒

translation.en: -Do you want one? -Uh, no, no.
translation.zh: -你要喝酒吗？-不

translation.en: You sure?
translation.zh: 你确定？

translation.en: -[in English] What's that last thing? -Oh, it's, um…
translation.zh: -你最后点的是什么？-是…

translation.en: -Separate checks. Yeah. -Separate checks?
translation.zh: -分开付账-分开付账？

translation.en: You're a writer and I just want to respect that.
translation.zh: 你是个作家 我想尊重你

translation.en: Both of my parents are artists. They make and sell their own jewelry.
translation.zh: 我的父母是艺术家他们自己生产和销售首饰

translation.en: So as you can imagine, it's, uh… there have been times when the bills have been challenging.
translation.zh: 你能想象到总有些时候手头会有点紧

translation.en: So I figure it's better to--
translation.zh: 我想最好…

translation.en: I'm sure you can understand and appreciate that sometimes it's--
translation.zh: 我确定你能理解有时候…

translation.en: -Thank you. I appreciate it. Nice of you. -Yeah. Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 我很感激 你真好-没事 应该的

translation.en: So you speak fluent Italian. How'd that happen?
translation.zh: 你的意大利语说得很流利怎么做到的？

translation.en: Well, actually, I also speak French and German.
translation.zh: 其实 我还会说法语和德语

translation.en: Little bit of Mandarin.
translation.zh: 还有一点普通话

translation.en: -You speak a little Mandarin? -A bit.
translation.zh: -你还会说普通话？-一点

translation.en: [in Mandarin] I kid you not!
translation.zh: 我没骗你！

translation.en: [in English] No, it's… I'm a language major, so…
translation.zh: 我没骗你！ 我学语言的

translation.en: -Got it. Cool. You don't hear that-- -Grazie.
translation.zh: -知道了 太酷了 你没听到…-你知道

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 很感谢

translation.en: Um, so how do you while away the hours these days?
translation.zh: 这些天来 你都做什么消磨时光呢？

translation.en: Actually, I just applied for a job as a translator at the UN.
translation.zh: 其实我刚申请了联合国的翻译工作

translation.en: -It's a long shot. -Long shot? Why is it a long shot?
translation.zh: -希望渺茫-为什么？

translation.en: Isn't everything?
translation.zh: 所有的事情不都如此吗？

translation.en: -Um, sorry, I should take this. -Sure. No problem. -One second. -Sure.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我要接一下 稍等-好的 没问题 好的

translation.en: I'll see you at the table, all right? Welcome home, stranger!
translation.zh: 回头座位上见 欢迎回家 陌生人

translation.en: Dion, hey! How are you?
translation.zh: 迪翁！你还好吗？

translation.en: -Man, how long has it been? -It's been a while. 12th grade.
translation.zh: -多久没见了？-有一阵子了 上次还是12年级

translation.en: Yeah, you disappeared. Where did you go to college, anyway?
translation.zh: 你消失了 你去哪上的大学？

translation.en: You know, I didn't go. I ended up… I went to Paris. School of life.
translation.zh: 我没上学 我去了巴黎 生活即是学校

translation.en: Oh, that's right. You look exactly the same.
translation.zh: 没错 你看起来还是一模一样

translation.en: Only richer.
translation.zh: 只是更有钱了

translation.en: Is it true they're turning your new book into a movie?
translation.zh: 他们把你的新书改成电影了？

translation.en: I don't know. I mean, this is what they say.
translation.zh: 我不知道 是这么说来着

translation.en: -Hometown hero. -Thank you very much. You're very kind.
translation.zh: -故乡之光-非常感谢 你真好

translation.en: -It's great seeing you, man. -Good to see you.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-很高兴见到你

translation.en: Sorry about that.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们说到哪了？

translation.en: -Where were we? -We were, um…
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们说到哪了？ 我们…

translation.en: Potential job. UN. Long shot.
translation.zh: 可能的工作 联合国 希望渺茫

translation.en: Yeah, it's…
translation.zh: 是的 那个…

translation.en: I don't know, with this new job, it could be challenging. I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道 这份新工作可能会很有挑战性

translation.en: -We may have to move and it's just… -"We"?
translation.zh: -我们可能要搬家 那个…-“我们”

translation.en: Yeah, Alan and me.
translation.zh: 对 艾伦和我

translation.en: -And Alan is? -Oh, God, sorry. Alan's my fiancé.
translation.zh: -艾伦是哪位？-天啊 抱歉 艾伦是我的未婚夫

translation.en: Oh, you're engaged?
translation.zh: 你订婚了？

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. Yeah. Hey, congratulations. I love love.
translation.zh: -对-嘿 恭喜你 我喜欢爱情故事

translation.en: -Great. Thank you. -Cheers. This is wonderful.
translation.zh: -很好 谢谢-干杯 太好了

translation.en: Um, we haven't set a date yet.
translation.zh: 我们婚期还没定

translation.en: And Alan wants to, but if I do get this job, then…
translation.zh: 艾伦想定下来但如果我得到这份工作 那么…

translation.en: I don't-- We'll just have to figure it out, I guess. Haven't even looked for engagement rings yet.
translation.zh: 我们就得想办法了我们甚至都没去看订婚戒指

translation.en: Well, we went last week, and I don't know, I couldn't pick anything.
translation.zh: 我们上周是去看了 但我什么都没选

translation.en: So I just… we just left and then…
translation.zh: 然后我们就走了 然后…

translation.en: Actually, this was kind of cute. On the walk home, he gave me this.
translation.zh: 其实还挺可爱的在回家的路上 他给了我这个

translation.en: -[Jacob] What's that? -It's…
translation.zh: -是什么？-是…

translation.en: Cigar ring.
translation.zh: 雪茄环标

translation.en: Believe it or not, this silly ring came as kind of a relief.
translation.zh: 这个蠢蠢的戒指让我松了一口气

translation.en: -Yeah? -I'm not into all that "Diamonds Are a Girl's Best Friend" kind of stuff.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢“钻石是女孩的好朋友”那一套的东西

translation.en: The truth is I'm kind of ambivalent about the concept of being engaged.
translation.zh: 事实是 我对订婚这个想法感觉有点矛盾

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -One the one hand, I like the certainty,
translation.zh: 我喜欢那种确定性

translation.en: but on the other, it makes you feel kind of boxed in, you know?
translation.zh: 但我又觉得被圈住了 你懂吗？

translation.en: Yeah, no, "boxed in" is something I've managed to avoid my entire life.
translation.zh: “被圈住”是我一生都在逃避的东西

translation.en: In my case, it's tricky 'cause Alan likes doing things by the book.
translation.zh: 我的事情很棘手因为艾伦喜欢按章办事

translation.en: And it's important to respect what the other person wants. Right?
translation.zh: 要尊重对方的心意也很重要 对吧？

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -But he's a tax attorney!
translation.zh: 他是个税务律师

translation.en: He's very, very good at his job, and he's super precise.
translation.zh: 他非常擅长自己的工作 超级精准

translation.en: Believe me, he'll be the one planning our wedding down to the very last place card.
translation.zh: 他会负责策划我们的婚礼落实到每一张座位牌

translation.en: It's gonna run like clockwork.
translation.zh: 肯定会做到精确无误

translation.en: And the good thing is, then I promise I'll shut up, but I think, I don't know, Alan and I complement one another.
translation.zh: 好事情是 我保证自己会闭嘴我觉得艾伦和我很互补

translation.en: And that's how it's… It's supposed to be like that, right?
translation.zh: 就是这样…应该是这样吧？

translation.en: I mean, I'm not an expert on the subject, but, yeah, that sounds about right.
translation.zh: 我不是这方面的专家 但听起来不错

translation.en: Well, for better or worse, I am.
translation.zh: 的确 我们要患难与共

translation.en: I don't know, I think being adopted, I'm just…
translation.zh: 因为我是被收养的 我觉得我总是…

translation.en: I'm always trying to fill some kind of void.
translation.zh: 我总是在试着填补某种空虚感

translation.en: I'm always looking for security and reliability,
translation.zh: 我一直在寻找安全感和依靠

translation.en: and that's why I think if I find my real-- my birth mom, it's…
translation.zh: 所以我才会觉得如果我找到真的…亲生妈妈…

translation.en: I don't know, it'll resolve this huge uncertainty in my life and then…
translation.zh: 会解决我生活中的巨大不确定性 然后…

translation.en: -I don't know. -You'll be free.
translation.zh: -我不知道-你会变得自由

translation.en: -Yeah. -Come on.
translation.zh: -对-来吧

translation.en: [Rachel] Honestly, I really would have been happy to split it.
translation.zh: 我真的很想跟你分摊账单

translation.en: [Jacob] Oh, come on. No, it was my pleasure. Good food, good company.
translation.zh: 不 这是我的荣幸好的食物 好的陪伴

translation.en: That's a three-hour date.
translation.zh: 他们约了三个小时

translation.en: I guess the universe really does reward the brave.
translation.zh: 我猜皇天不负勇敢者

translation.en: [sighs] I should probably tackle another room.
translation.zh: 我应该再整理一个房间

translation.en: Hey, um, I was actually wondering, do you think there's a…
translation.zh: 嘿 我其实在想 你觉得你父母有没有可能

translation.en: there's a chance your parents kept something of my mother's?
translation.zh: 留下我母亲的东西？

translation.en: A card? A photo?
translation.zh: 卡片？照片？

translation.en: Anything?
translation.zh: 任何东西？

translation.en: -[Rachel grunts] Yeah. Okay. -Be careful now.
translation.zh: -小心点-好

translation.en: -[Jacob] You got it? All right. -Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh: -你可以吧？好吧-对 好

translation.en: -[Jacob] Plop it right here's fine. -Oh, God.
translation.zh: -放在这里就好-好

translation.en: -Is there a dead body in there? -I'm afraid to look to be honest with you.
translation.zh: -里面有尸体吗？-我不敢看

translation.en: -Hey, who played? -Huh?
translation.zh: 嘿 谁弹钢琴呀？

translation.en: Oh, my mom forced me to take lessons when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 我小时候 我妈逼学过

translation.en: -At first, I pretty much hated it. -And then?
translation.zh: -一开始我很讨厌-然后呢？

translation.en: Then it made her really happy to hear me play, so…
translation.zh: 听了我的演奏 她很开心 所以…

translation.en: Will you play something for me?
translation.zh: 你可以为我弹点什么吗？

translation.en: -Play something for you? Come on. No. -Seriously.
translation.zh: 为你弹点什么？不

translation.en: Seriously, I wanna see if the piano sounds as beautiful as it looks.
translation.zh: 我想听听钢琴的音色是不是像看上去那么好

translation.en: Please?
translation.zh: 求你了？

translation.en: All right. It's been a while, so I'm probably a little rusty.
translation.zh: 好吧 好久没弹 可能有点生疏

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause your mama's all alone ♪
translation.zh: 因为你妈妈总是一个人

translation.en: ♪ I have tried in vain ♪
translation.zh: 我试过 徒劳无功

translation.en: ♪ Never more to call your name ♪
translation.zh: 别再呼唤你的名字

translation.en: ♪ When you left, you broke my heart ♪
translation.zh: 你离开的时候 让我心碎

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I never thought we'd part ♪
translation.zh: 因为我从没想过会分开

translation.en: ♪ Every hour in the day You will hear me say ♪
translation.zh: 每天每时每刻 你都会听到我说

translation.en: ♪ Baby, won't you please come home? ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你能不能回家？

translation.en: ♪ Oh, home ♪
translation.zh: 家

translation.en: ♪ Baby ♪
translation.zh: 亲爱的…

translation.en: ♪ Won't you please come home? ♪
translation.zh: 你能不能回家？

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: [Rachel] Ah! Young love.
translation.zh: 年轻的爱

translation.en: -[Ellie] Hi! -So how was the date?
translation.zh: -嗨！-约会怎么样？

translation.en: It went well.
translation.zh: 还可以吧

translation.en: Just well?
translation.zh: 只是还可以？

translation.en: It went very well.
translation.zh: 非常可以

translation.en: This is my friend, Rachel. -[Ellie] Hi! -Hi, nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -这是我的朋友 瑞秋-很高兴认识你

translation.en: Rachel's got a question I think maybe only you can answer.
translation.zh: 瑞秋有个问题 我想只有你能回答

translation.en: [Ellie] Of course, I remember her.
translation.zh: 我当然记得她

translation.en: She was a babysitter, a live-in babysitter,
translation.zh: 她是个保姆 住家保姆

translation.en: like, you know, like an au pair.
translation.zh: 类似于互惠生

translation.en: [Rachel] Right. Right, sure.
translation.zh: 是哦

translation.en: She was very young. Seventeen, maybe 18 at the most.
translation.zh: 她当时很年轻 17岁 最多18岁

translation.en: She must have moved before the baby was born.
translation.zh: 她肯定是在孩子出生前搬走的

translation.en: Do you remember her name or…
translation.zh: 你是否记得她的名字或者…

translation.en: Gosh, that's a good question.
translation.zh: 问得好

translation.en: Seems like it had something to do with Christmas,
translation.zh: 似乎和圣诞节有关

translation.en: like, um, Christina or Joy.
translation.zh: 比如克里斯蒂娜或者乔伊

translation.en: I'm drawing a blank, but you know who would know?
translation.zh: 我想不起来了但是你知道谁清楚吗？

translation.en: -Who's that? -Your dad.
translation.zh: -谁？-你爸爸

translation.en: No, I don't, um… No.
translation.zh: 不 我不…不

translation.en: Well, anyway, he lives in Vermont now.
translation.zh: 总之 他现在住在佛蒙特州

translation.en: It's way up in the mountains in a little town called Cornwall Bridge,
translation.zh: 在一个叫康沃尔桥的小镇里往山上去的地方

translation.en: living pretty much off the grid.
translation.zh: 与外界隔离

translation.en: How do you… [sighs] How do you know all that?
translation.zh: 你怎么…你怎么知道这些的？

translation.en: When I saw him at the funeral, we had a nice long chat.
translation.zh: 我在葬礼上看到他我们好好聊了一番

translation.en: You know, I really don't think there would be any harm in talking--
translation.zh: 我真的不觉得聊聊会有什么不好…

translation.en: "Harm in talking"? No, there will be harm. I haven't spoken to the guy in 35 years, Ellie, come on.
translation.zh: “聊聊有什么不好”？是不好我已经35年没和他说过话

translation.en: [hesitates] No, I'm aware, but--
translation.zh: 不 我知道 但…

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm… Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不 我…不好意思

translation.en: Sorry. It's, uh…
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -[door closes] -[Ellie] Oh, Jacob.
translation.zh: 哦 雅各布

translation.en: Now you know why he stayed away so long.
translation.zh: 现在你知道他为什么离开这么久了

translation.en: It would be good for him if he could get over it.
translation.zh: 能克服这事 对他来说是件好事

translation.en: -[Jacob] Rachel! Rachel, wait! -What?
translation.zh: -瑞秋！瑞秋 等等！-什么？

translation.en: -Listen. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -听着-怎么了？

translation.en: I know all that stuff in there with my dad probably seemed irrational.
translation.zh: 刚才聊到我爸爸 我似乎有点不理智

translation.en: Oh, no, Jake, please. You don't owe me any explanation, okay?
translation.zh: 别这样 你不欠我任何解释

translation.en: I'm just some stranger who showed up on your doorstep. You don't owe me anything.
translation.zh: 我只是出现在你家门口的陌生人你并不欠我什么

translation.en: You've already helped me, like, a lot. So thank you. And…
translation.zh: 你已经帮了我很多 谢谢

translation.en: I really hope you have a lovely… a lovely Christmas.
translation.zh: 我真的希望你能过个开心的圣诞节

translation.en: You headed home?
translation.zh: 你要回家吗？

translation.en: No, I'm going to Cornwall Bridge.
translation.zh: 不 我要去康沃尔桥

translation.en: I need to know if I ever mattered to her. Maybe you've wondered that about your dad?
translation.zh: 我需要知道她有没有在乎过我也许你也想知道 你爸是否在乎过你

translation.en: Truth is, if I ever saw him, I wouldn't know what to say to him.
translation.zh: 如果我见到他都不知道该跟他说什么

translation.en: Well, maybe if you're up for a drive,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你想去兜兜风

translation.en: we could script a few lines.
translation.zh: 我们可以先写一些台词

translation.en: [Jacob] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Hop on up.
translation.zh: 上去

translation.en: You're leaving! I guess it's, uh, time to head home?
translation.zh: 你要走了 我猜你是要回家？

translation.en: Well, yes and no, actually.
translation.zh: 嗯 没错 其实是也不是

translation.en: -How you doing? Jake Turner. Pleasure. -Oh, Ian Page. Pleased to meet you.
translation.zh: -你好吗？杰克·特纳 幸会-伊恩·佩吉 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -I'm a big fan of your work, really. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -我是你作品的忠实粉丝-谢谢

translation.en: I told Ian that you basically wrote my profile.
translation.zh: 我跟伊恩说我的个人资料基本是你写的

translation.en: Ah, well, you know, she made me take out all the racy stuff.
translation.zh: 她让我把所有猥琐的东西都删掉了

translation.en: [laughs] Well, all's I can say is meeting Eleanor
translation.zh: 好吧 我只能说遇到埃莉诺拉

translation.en: is the greatest Christmas surprise I could ask for.
translation.zh: 真的是我最大的圣诞惊喜

translation.en: Ian plays first violin with the Hartford Symphony.
translation.zh: 伊恩是哈特福德交响乐团的第一小提琴手

translation.en: Is that right? That's impressive. -That's great. -Thanks, mate.
translation.zh: -是吗？真厉害-谢谢你 伙计

translation.en: What did you mean when you said you were leaving, "Yes and no"?
translation.zh: 你说要离开“是也不是”是什么意思？

translation.en: Yes, I'm leaving. No, I'm not going home. Uh, Rachel's supposed to be--
translation.zh: 是 我是要走不 我不回家 瑞秋打算…

translation.en: -Oh, there she is. Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -她来了 喂-喂

translation.en: She's convinced me-- And you, uh…
translation.zh: 她说服了我…还有你

translation.en: I'm gonna go see my dad.
translation.zh: 我要去见我爸

translation.en: Jacob.
translation.zh: 雅各布

translation.en: Good for you.
translation.zh: 好样的

translation.en: Well, the universe rewards the brave, right?
translation.zh: 皇天不负勇敢者 对吧？

translation.en: You ready for this?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Absolutely not. You?
translation.zh: 绝对没有 你呢？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: [Jacob] Don't you think Waze would be easier?
translation.zh: 直接用导航不是更容易吗？

translation.en: Yeah, of course it would. But maps are so much nicer, it's like a…
translation.zh: 当然是 但地图更有趣 有种虚拟世界的触觉

translation.en: tactile thing in a virtual world, you know?
translation.zh: 但地图更有趣 有种虚拟世界的触觉

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I had this idea… I had this idea for a book about that.
translation.zh: 对 我懂我之前本打算把这个想法写成书

translation.en: -A Stephen King thriller-type thing. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -史蒂芬·金那种惊险类型的-嗯？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, so here's what I came up with. There's this couple, right?
translation.zh: 是的 我想到了一个故事 -一对情侣正在度蜜月-好

translation.en: -They're on their honeymoon. -Okay.
translation.zh: -一对情侣正在度蜜月-好

translation.en: And they're in a rental car.
translation.zh: 他们租了辆车

translation.en: The GPS is, like, possessed or something, or maybe the ex-boyfriend hacked into it.
translation.zh: 全球定位系统被附身又或者是被前男友黑掉了

translation.en: That might be better, I'm not sure. Anyway.
translation.zh: 那样说可能更好 反正 不管是什么情况全球定位系统把他们引向了致命危险

translation.en: Whatever the case, the GPS leads them into mortal danger.
translation.zh: 反正 不管是什么情况全球定位系统把他们引向了致命危险

translation.en: You hate it. Bad? It's bad.
translation.zh: 你不喜欢 不好吗？不好

translation.en: No, no, no! You know, I like it. I like it.
translation.zh: 不 你知道的 我喜欢

translation.en: But what happens next? I mean, like, after they're in mortal danger.
translation.zh: 但接下来呢？我是说在他们陷入致命危险之后

translation.en: Yeah, I don't-- That's as far as I got. Never wrote it.
translation.zh: 我只想到这里 还没动笔

translation.en: -[laughs] All right. -That's it. Well, as my dad said, "No creative idea's ever wasted."
translation.zh: 就像我爸说的：“创意的想法永远不会被浪费”

translation.en: -So there you go. -I like that.
translation.zh: -好了-说得好

translation.en: [Rachel] Okay, in three miles, take I-91 North. -[Jacob] 91 North. You got it. -Yup.
translation.zh: -好了 五公里后上I-91北-91北路 没问题

translation.en: [Rachel] Alan always gets kind of annoyed when I give him directions.
translation.zh: 我给艾伦导航的时候 他总是很烦我

translation.en: -Really? -He says he doesn't need a co-pilot.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-他说他不需要副驾驶

translation.en: I could use any navigational help I can get.
translation.zh: 给我什么导航 我都愿意用

translation.en: Speaking of Alan,
translation.zh: 说到艾伦

translation.en: what's he think about this, um, this job you applied for in New York?
translation.zh: 他怎么看你申请的纽约工作？

translation.en: Um, actually, I, uh…
translation.zh: 其实 我…他不…

translation.en: He doesn't… I haven't told him about it yet.
translation.zh: 其实 我…他不… 我还没告诉他

translation.en: What's he think about this trip to Cornwall Bridge? Uh, he's not thrilled. He's not thrilled.
translation.zh: -那这次去康沃尔桥怎么样？-他不怎么兴奋

translation.en: And actually he was kind of… peeved.
translation.zh: 其实他还有点生气

translation.en: Yeah. No, let me guess, it's, uh…
translation.zh: 对 不 让我猜猜看

translation.en: He's upset that you are taking a road trip with this guy you just met?
translation.zh: 他不高兴是因为你和刚认识的男人一起上路

translation.en: No, actually. No, it was, um…
translation.zh: 不 其实是…

translation.en: It was about the… the gas money.
translation.zh: 是因为油钱

translation.en: No, it's just like one of those little Alan quirks. [Jacob] Okay.
translation.zh: -这是艾伦的怪癖之一-好

translation.en: It's no big deal, and in the grand scheme of things, it's meaningless, right?
translation.zh: 没什么大不了的从大的方面来看 这没什么 对吧？

translation.en: I'm kind of insulted. He's not concerned about me, right?
translation.zh: 我有点被侮辱了 他竟然不担心我

translation.en: -He's concerned about gas money. -Well, he doesn't know about you.
translation.zh: -他担心的是油钱-他不知道你

translation.en: [Rachel] As it turns out, I didn't really know about you either.
translation.zh: 而且事实证明我也不太知道你

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -I finally broke down and I Googled you.
translation.zh: -什么？-我终于忍不住用谷歌搜索了你

translation.en: -Oh, come on. -And, honestly, I tried to put it off.
translation.zh: 拜托 我试着忍住 我不喜欢搜索别人

translation.en: Because I really don't like looking people up.
translation.zh: 我试着忍住 我不喜欢搜索别人

translation.en: It always seems like an intrusion, somehow.
translation.zh: 就好像是某种侵犯

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -But now… I'm really glad I did.
translation.zh: -但现在 我真的很高兴-才不是

translation.en: -No. -'Cause now I know you're this, like, super-famous, best-selling novelist, so…
translation.zh: 因为现在我知道你是超级有名的畅销小说家

translation.en: Uh, super famous is a bit of a stretch, I think.
translation.zh: -所以…-超级有名有点夸张

translation.en: Well, um, five million copies sold--
translation.zh: 卖了五百万份…

translation.en: It's like five and a half at this point, but it's okay, who's counting?
translation.zh: 现在是五百五十万但是有什么所谓呢？

translation.en: And number one on The New York Times Best Seller List.
translation.zh: 《纽约时报》畅销书榜第一名

translation.en: -I got lucky. -And, uh, translated into 30 languages.
translation.zh: -我很幸运-翻译成30种语言

translation.en: -I think that makes you super famous. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我觉得你超级有名 但只是…

translation.en: Here was little old me worried about how you were gonna pay for dinner.
translation.zh: 反倒是我这么个小人物竟然担心你付不起晚饭钱

translation.en: Hey, do you mind grabbing my wallet? It's in the backpack in the back there.
translation.zh: 你能帮我拿下钱包吗？在后座的背包里

translation.en: -Thank you very much. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: -[grunts] -Jake, do you know what this is?
translation.zh: 你知道这是什么吗？

translation.en: No. You know what? I just, uh… That was in a box marked "personal" at my mom's.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？这是在我妈妈一个写着“私人”的盒子里找到的

translation.en: I just kinda picked it up, and I didn't look at it. What is it?
translation.zh: 我只是收起来都没看 怎么了？

translation.en: [voice breaking] Okay, listen to this.
translation.zh: 好吧 听说

translation.en: "My name is Noel Ellis."
translation.zh: “我叫诺埃尔·埃利斯”

translation.en: "I'm 17 years old, and I'm having a baby."
translation.zh: “我17岁 即将生下一个孩子”

translation.en: This is my mother's diary.
translation.zh: 这是我妈妈的日记

translation.en: I know it. I know it.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Her name is Noel. I can't believe this.
translation.zh: 她叫诺埃尔 真不敢相信

translation.en: [laughing incredulously] I can't-- I just-- I can't--
translation.zh: 我不能…我只是…我不能…

translation.en: "My parents sent me away to have my baby."
translation.zh: “我父母让我出来生孩子”

translation.en: "They're ashamed of me."
translation.zh: “他们因我感到羞耻”

translation.en: [Noel] And they're ashamed of the child I'm bringing into this world.
translation.zh: 他们为我带到这个世界的孩子感到羞耻

translation.en: And so, I'm leaving.
translation.zh: 所以 我要离开

translation.en: "They truly believe it's wrong for a woman to have a child outside of marriage."
translation.zh: “他们真心认为女人没结婚就生孩子是错误的”

translation.en: "'God disapproves,' they say."
translation.zh: “他们说：‘上帝不同意’”

translation.en: [Noel] But doesn't God forgive our mistakes?
translation.zh: 但上帝不是会原谅我们的错误吗？

translation.en: Everyone I know and trust has abandoned me.
translation.zh: 我认识和信任的所有人都抛弃了我

translation.en: "Thankfully, this really kind family hired me as their nanny."
translation.zh: “幸好有户好人家雇了我做保姆”

translation.en: [Noel] The Turners are a family of four.
translation.zh: “特纳一家有四口人”

translation.en: [Rachel] "Scott and Lois and their little boys, Benjamin and Jacob."
translation.zh: “斯科特和洛伊斯和他们的儿子们本杰明和雅各布”

translation.en: [Noel] Benji's seven and has loads of energy.
translation.zh: 本杰明七岁 精力旺盛

translation.en: Jake is four, and he's the quiet one.
translation.zh: 杰克四岁 他是安静的那个

translation.en: Do you have any memory of that? I know you were little, but…
translation.zh: 你记得吗？我知道你当时很小 但…

translation.en: I really don't.
translation.zh: 我真的不记得

translation.en: [Noel] He likes me to read the Magic Tree House books to him.
translation.zh: 他喜欢我给他读《魔法树屋》的书

translation.en: So where's Ben now?
translation.zh: 本现在人在哪里呢？

translation.en: Oh, there was this, um, snowstorm. It was around Christmas.
translation.zh: 有一年暴风雪来临 在圣诞节附近

translation.en: We had… We had this giant elm tree in our front yard.
translation.zh: 我们家前面院子里有棵大榆树

translation.en: Benji loved to climb and he was in that tree all the time.
translation.zh: 本杰明喜欢爬树 他一直在那棵树上

translation.en: And that night, Ben decided he was gonna climb as high as he could in that tree.
translation.zh: 那天晚上 本决定爬上那棵树越高越好…

translation.en: [Rachel] ♪ Don't know why ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么

translation.en: ♪ There's no sun up in the sky Stormy weather… ♪
translation.zh: 天上没有太阳 暴风雨天气…

translation.en: Sorry about earlier, I got so emotional talking about my brother.
translation.zh: 抱歉 说到哥哥 我有点情绪化

translation.en: No, it's… You don't need to apologize. I understand.
translation.zh: 没事 你不需要道歉 我懂

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: It's been over 30 years, you know? You'd think I'd be able to… talk about it.
translation.zh: 已经过去30多年了我还以为能说出来

translation.en: You know that saying, "Time heals all wounds"?
translation.zh: 你听说过“时间会治愈一切伤口”吗？

translation.en: It doesn't.
translation.zh: 并不会

translation.en: [Noel] It's been two months now,
translation.zh: 已经两个月了

translation.en: and I still haven't heard a word from either of my parents or Peter.
translation.zh: 我还是没有收到父母或彼得的只言片语

translation.en: [Rachel] "One day in my room, I just couldn't stop crying…"
translation.zh: “有一天 在房间里我忍不住哭了出来…”

translation.en: [both] And there was this quiet knock on the door.
translation.zh: 忽然有人轻声敲了门

translation.en: [Rachel] "And little Jacob came in."
translation.zh: “小雅各布走进来”

translation.en: [Noel] He laid his head on my shoulder, and it was as if he understood.
translation.zh: 他把头放在我的肩膀上仿佛他能理解我

translation.en: I love that kid more and more every day.
translation.zh: 我一天天越来越喜欢他了

translation.en: I know you're not supposed to have favorites, but…
translation.zh: 我知道不该偏心 但是…

translation.en: [waitress] One New York, rare,
translation.zh: 一份纽约式牛排 一分熟

translation.en: and one vegetarian plate, no peppers, no carrots, no onions, sauce on the side.
translation.zh: 还有一份蔬菜沙拉 不要辣椒 胡萝卜 洋葱酱汁放在旁边

translation.en: Thank you. Perfect.
translation.zh: 谢谢 完美

translation.en: -Hey, can I ask you a question? -Can I stop you?
translation.zh: -我能问你一个问题吗？-我能不让吗？

translation.en: -No. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 不能

translation.en: Why is it that a handsome, successful guy like you is still single?
translation.zh: 为什么像你这样的帅气成功的男人还是个单身？

translation.en: -Handsome? -Don't deflect.
translation.zh: -帅气？-别转移话题

translation.en: -I like to be alone, I guess, you know? -Hmm. Safer that way. I get it.
translation.zh: 我估计是因为喜欢一个人吧你懂吗？ 这样更安全 我懂

translation.en: But you're engaged.
translation.zh: 但你已经订婚了

translation.en: Still, there's always that, like, push-pull thing, you know?
translation.zh: 但还是有拉扯的感觉 你懂吗？

translation.en: -Mmm. -"Come closer."
translation.zh: “靠近点”

translation.en: -"I want to be alone." You know? -[chuckles] Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: “我想一个人待着” 你知道吗？

translation.en: I mean, I've had relationships in the past, don't get me wrong.
translation.zh: 我以前谈过恋爱 别误会

translation.en: I've had serious relationships in the past, a few of them anyway, but…
translation.zh: 我有过很认真的感情 有几段

translation.en: You know, in the end, they all just, uh…
translation.zh: 但最后全都…

translation.en: In the end, I just wasn't what they were looking for, you know?
translation.zh: 最后 我都不是她们要找的人你懂吗？

translation.en: Maybe they weren't what you were looking for.
translation.zh: 也许是因为她们不是你要找的人

translation.en: Uh, question. What are the odds of us making it through the pass before the storm hits?
translation.zh: 今晚暴风雪前我们通行的概率有多大？

translation.en: -Tonight? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -今晚？-对

translation.en: Ooh, I'd say about…
translation.zh: 我只能说是

translation.en: zero.
translation.zh: 零

translation.en: -[Jacob] Percent? -Percent.
translation.zh: -百分率？-百分率

translation.en: Why don't you check us in? I think Ava needs to stretch her legs.
translation.zh: 要不你去登记房间？我觉得艾娃需要伸展一下腿部

translation.en: -Sure! Meet you back here in 20? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好 20分钟后见？-对

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Rachel] Hey! [Alan] Hey, stranger.
translation.zh: -喂！-嘿 陌生人

translation.en: Look, I, uh, I wanted to apologize for the other night.
translation.zh: 听着 我想为那晚的事道歉

translation.en: I know this stuff with your mom, trying to find her--
translation.zh: 你妈妈的事 你要找她…

translation.en: No, no, no, Alan. Don't worry. Don't worry. It's fine.
translation.zh: 不 艾伦 没事 没关系

translation.en: Uh, so, listen, on a forward-thinking note,
translation.zh: 听着 我有一个前瞻性的想法

translation.en: I had an idea for our engagement party.
translation.zh: 是关于我们订婚派对的想法

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Yeah, you know that Mexican restaurant you love, Casa Frida?
translation.zh: 那家你喜欢的墨西哥餐厅弗里达之家？

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -So it's available Valentine's Day,
translation.zh: 情人节当天有空位

translation.en: which is perfect for an engagement party, right?
translation.zh: 用来办订婚派对完美了 是不是？

translation.en: Plus, they are giving us a phenomenal price.
translation.zh: 而且 他们给了我们超低价格

translation.en: Oh, that sounds great.
translation.zh: 听起来不错

translation.en: Yeah? So my plan is give them a deposit first thing tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: 嗯？所以 我的计划是明天一大早就去交定金

translation.en: Alan, can we just…
translation.zh: 艾伦 我能…

translation.en: Can we just wait on Casa Frida?
translation.zh: 弗里达之家的事能等一下嘛？

translation.en: Till I get back.
translation.zh: 等我回来

translation.en: Of course, babe. Yeah. Whatever you want.
translation.zh: 当然可以 宝贝 好 随便你

translation.en: -When are you back? -Soon.
translation.zh: -你什么时候回来？-很快

translation.en: Okay. Love you.
translation.zh: 好 爱你

translation.en: I love you too.
translation.zh: 我也爱你

translation.en: You're in luck! Got two rooms left. Great! Terrific.
translation.zh: -你真幸运 还剩两间房-很好 好极了

translation.en: You know, if this were a rom-com, you'd have one room left.
translation.zh: 如果这是甜剧 你应该只剩一个房间

translation.en: We'd have to share it.
translation.zh: 我们必须得分享

translation.en: Rom-com?
translation.zh: 甜剧？

translation.en: Romantic comedy, rom-com.
translation.zh: 爱情喜剧 又称甜剧

translation.en: -Oh, right! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对-对

translation.en: Well, if it helps,
translation.zh: 或许能帮到你

translation.en: the rooms are connected.
translation.zh: 两间房是通的

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry, you're closing.
translation.zh: 对不起 你要打烊了

translation.en: I was gonna head to the pageant, but it can wait. How can I help?
translation.zh: 我本来要去看演出有什么能帮到你的吗？

translation.en: I was wondering if you had any books by Jacob Turner?
translation.zh: 你有雅各布·特纳的书吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Of course! How far along are you in the series?
translation.zh: 当然有 他的系列你看到哪里了？

translation.en: Uh… I'm at the beginning, so I don't know.
translation.zh: 我才开始看 所以不知道

translation.en: Okay! You want Book One, Green Eyes of Paris. We should have that.
translation.zh: 你要的是第一本书《巴黎绿眼》我们应该有

translation.en: Great! So what's it about?
translation.zh: 好 那是说什么的？

translation.en: Paris in the '40s.
translation.zh: 40年代的巴黎

translation.en: The French Resistance, espionage, forbidden love.
translation.zh: 法国抵抗运动 间谍 禁忌之爱

translation.en: Oh, wow. Sounds pretty--
translation.zh: 哇 听起来很…

translation.en: Riveting, right? And trust me, it is.
translation.zh: 吸引人对吧？相信我 真的如此

translation.en: The world this guy creates,
translation.zh: 他创造的世界

translation.en: it's like you're actually there with his characters.
translation.zh: 会让你觉得和那些角色同在

translation.en: It's what makes the book so absorbing.
translation.zh: 它让这本书很吸引人

translation.en: That's probably why I have such a hard time keeping them on the shelves.
translation.zh: 所以才很难保证货架上一直有这本书

translation.en: Ah! Look at that, you're in luck.
translation.zh: 看这里 你走运了

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Not bad.
translation.zh: 还不错

translation.en: Yeah, and he writes almost as good as he looks.
translation.zh: 没错 他写的东西和长相一样好

translation.en: -[Jacob] Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: So, what do you think? Should we call it a night, or…
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？我们今晚到此为止还是…？

translation.en: "Or." Definitely "or."
translation.zh: “还是” 那绝对选“还是”

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah, yeah, come on.
translation.zh: 对 来吧

translation.en: Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐！

translation.en: -There you are. -[customer] Thank you.
translation.zh: -给你们-谢谢

translation.en: -[Jacob] Look at this. -Look at this! Hi! So cute.
translation.zh: -看看这个-看看这个 嗨！好可爱

translation.en: [Jacob] You better knock it off. She'll get jealous.
translation.zh: 最好别这样 它会吃醋的

translation.en: -[Jacob] Incredible. -[Rachel] I love it here.
translation.zh: -难以置信-我喜欢这里

translation.en: -How are you? -Hi!
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-嗨！

translation.en: -Do you mind if we have… -[vendor] Absolutely.
translation.zh: -不介意我们…？-当然

translation.en: -Thank you! You're giving these away? -[vendor] On the house.
translation.zh: -谢谢 这些是送的吗？-免费

translation.en: -Thank you! -It's my favorite town.
translation.zh: -谢谢！-我太喜欢这个小镇了

translation.en: -[Jacob] Smells great. -Happy holidays.
translation.zh: -好香啊-节日快乐

translation.en: Oh, wow, look at that! I haven't seen this film in years.
translation.zh: 哇 看那个我好多年没看过这电影了

translation.en: -[Rachel] I've never seen it. -You're kidding. You're in for a treat.
translation.zh: -我没看过-开玩笑吧 你赚到了

translation.en: Excuse me, are you two together?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你们两个一起的吗？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Yeah? Well, yeah. We were, you know--
translation.zh: 嗯？好吧 我们曾经是…

translation.en: Maybe we are.
translation.zh: 对 我们是

translation.en: -Smooth. -[Rachel laughing]
translation.zh: 痛快点

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: I'm shakin' the dust of this crummy little town off my feet
translation.zh: 我要离开这个寒酸的小镇抖落脚上的尘土

translation.en: and I'm gonna see the world! -Italy, Greece… -[inaudible]
translation.zh: 去见识世界 意大利 希腊…

translation.en: [Rachel] Wow! That may be the best movie I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 哇！这可能是我看过最好的电影

translation.en: [Jacob] He wondered if this journey was about to take an unexpected turn.
translation.zh: 他在想这趟旅程会不会有意想不到的转折

translation.en: [Rachel gasps] Oh, my God. No way.
translation.zh: 天啊 不会吧

translation.en: Everything okay in there?
translation.zh: 你那边没事吧？

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 对 我没事

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -I just-- I heard-- I thought I heard a-- -Oh, yeah, no.
translation.zh: -我听到…我以为听到…-好吧 没事

translation.en: [laughs] Thanks for checking, though. Appreciate it.
translation.zh: 谢谢你来确认 很感激

translation.en: [nervously] Okay. Just, uh-- Well, just have a--
translation.zh: 好 那…祝你…

translation.en: -[Rachel] Good night. -Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安-晚安

translation.en: [Jacob] How'd you sleep?
translation.zh: 你睡得怎么样？

translation.en: [laughs] Actually, I was up last night reading.
translation.zh: 其实我昨晚一直在看书

translation.en: -Anything interesting? -Uh, yeah, very.
translation.zh: -有趣的内容？-对 非常有趣

translation.en: -Yeah? -Green Eyes of Paris.
translation.zh: -嗯？-《巴黎绿眼》 你知道吗？

translation.en: -You know that one? [laughing] -I've heard of it. You…
translation.zh: 我听说过 你…

translation.en: [laughs] You bought my book and you didn't tell me? Yeah, well, I didn't…
translation.zh: -你买了我的书却没告诉我？-我没…

translation.en: -I didn't wanna tell you just in case-- -Just in case what?
translation.zh: -我没想告诉你 以防…-以防什么？

translation.en: In case I didn't like it.
translation.zh: 以防我不喜欢

translation.en: -In case you didn't like it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -以防你不喜欢？-对

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 那个…

translation.en: No, it's okay. You can tell me. It's fine. My ego is, uh…
translation.zh: 没关系 你可以告诉我 我的自尊…

translation.en: I think I can handle it.
translation.zh: 我觉得能承受得住

translation.en: -What's up? What did you think? -Okay, well, um…
translation.zh: -怎么说？你觉得怎么样？-好吧…

translation.en: -You know, I find it interesting… -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我觉得很有趣

translation.en: …that you write these novels filled with suspense, and drama, romance,
translation.zh: 你写的小说充满了悬念和戏剧性 很浪漫

translation.en: and yet your main character, Henri,
translation.zh: 但你的主角亨利

translation.en: he never lets anyone get close to him.
translation.zh: 却不会轻易让身旁的人接近自己

translation.en: It's kinda like what we were talking about last night.
translation.zh: 就像我们昨晚聊过的那样

translation.en: Henri lives in occupied France, right? He can't trust anybody.
translation.zh: 亨利生活在被占领的法国 对吧？他不能相信任何人

translation.en: Well, yeah, but…
translation.zh: 好吧 可是…

translation.en: This isn't occupied America. So what's your excuse?
translation.zh: 这里不是被占领的美国那你的借口是什么？

translation.en: On the other hand…
translation.zh: 另一方面…

translation.en: -I really loved the book. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -我真的喜欢那本书-嗯？

translation.en: I loved it! It was just…
translation.zh: 我很喜欢 只是…

translation.en: God, the ending?
translation.zh: 天啦 那个结局 它…

translation.en: It kind of blew me away.
translation.zh: 有点把我吓到了

translation.en: Good. Good, good, good.
translation.zh: 很好 很好

translation.en: The endings are, uh… ending, it's… They're always hard to get right, you know. Yeah.
translation.zh: 结局总是很难写好 你懂吧

translation.en: Any thoughts on the current story? You gonna get that ending right?
translation.zh: 你对目前的故事有什么想法吗？你会写个好结局吧？

translation.en: [Noel] I found out today I'm having a girl,
translation.zh: 我今天发现自己怀的是个女孩

translation.en: a sweet, little baby girl.
translation.zh: 一个甜美的小女孩

translation.en: Before I left home, my parents told me not to name my baby.
translation.zh: 在我离家之前爸妈告诉我不要给孩子取名

translation.en: "Because it would only make it harder to say goodbye."
translation.zh: “因为这样 只会让道别变得更难”

translation.en: "But I've already… given her a name."
translation.zh: “但我已经… 给她取了个名字”

translation.en: [Noel] My angel.
translation.zh: 我的天使

translation.en: Um, can you pull over? I… I need… I need some air.
translation.zh: 你能停一下吗？我需要透透气

translation.en: -You sure? It's freezing outside. -Yeah, please.
translation.zh: -确定吗？外面很冷-对

translation.en: [Jacob] Okay. Sure.
translation.zh: 好 可以

translation.en: Hey. Come on.
translation.zh: 嘿 来吧

translation.en: Ah! It's freezing out here. Here you go.
translation.zh: 这里冻死了 给你

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: [voice breaking] Why would she leave it behind?
translation.zh: 她为什么要抛下这一切？

translation.en: Why go through the trouble of writing everything down
translation.zh: 她克服困难写下这些东西

translation.en: and documenting all these details if she wasn't…
translation.zh: 记录下所有的细节 而她又不…

translation.en: if she was just gonna abandon it?
translation.zh: 而她又要放弃的原因是什么呢？

translation.en: I don't know. You know, maybe she thought it would find its way back to you, eventually?
translation.zh: 我不知道也许是她觉得最终会被你发现？

translation.en: Or maybe she just wanted to forget everything.
translation.zh: 也许她只是想忘记一切

translation.en: Like it never existed.
translation.zh: 好像从未发生过

translation.en: -Like I never existed. -[quietly] No.
translation.zh: -好像我从不存在一样-不是的

translation.en: I'm supposed to be engaged. I'm supposed to be getting married.
translation.zh: 我要订婚了 我要结婚了

translation.en: -[Jacob] Oh, no! What are you-- No, wait! -[barking continues]
translation.zh: 不 你要…？等等

translation.en: -Come on! where are you-- No! -Ava? Ava!
translation.zh: -拜托 你要去…不！-艾娃！

translation.en: -[barking continues] -[Jacob] Ava!
translation.zh: 艾娃！

translation.en: Ava, no!
translation.zh: 艾娃 不要！

translation.en: [whistling loudly] Ava Turner, get back here right now!
translation.zh: 艾娃·特纳 立刻回来！

translation.en: -What were you gonna do if you caught it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你要是抓住 怎么办？-对

translation.en: [laughs] That was incredible.
translation.zh: 太厉害了

translation.en: Guess life's all about the chase, huh, Turner?
translation.zh: 看来人生就是为了追逐 对吧 特纳？

translation.en: -[Jacob] I think we took a wrong turn. -[Rachel laughs]
translation.zh: 我觉得走错路了

translation.en: -You mean you hope we took a wrong turn? -Exactly.
translation.zh: -你是说 希望我们走错路了？-没错

translation.en: Please tell me the universe really does reward the brave.
translation.zh: 拜托 请告诉我 皇天不负勇敢者

translation.en: You got this.
translation.zh: 没问题的

translation.en: [sighs] Here we go.
translation.zh: 好 我们走

translation.en: [Jacob] It was a day he had both been anticipating…
translation.zh: 那一天 他既期待…

translation.en: and dreading.
translation.zh: 又害怕

translation.en: Jacob.
translation.zh: 雅各布

translation.en: You know, Eleanor called to say you might be coming.
translation.zh: 埃莉诺打电话说你可能会来

translation.en: I told her I didn't believe it,
translation.zh: 我告诉她 我不相信

translation.en: but she said over and over again, "Just be prepared."
translation.zh: 但她反复地说：“只管准备好”

translation.en: Are you?
translation.zh: 你准备好了？

translation.en: Yeah! I… I'm cutting down this Christmas tree for you.
translation.zh: 对 我为你砍了棵圣诞树

translation.en: I've only been waiting for this moment for 30-odd years, and now that it's here…
translation.zh: 我等这一刻已经等了30多年现在终于来了…

translation.en: Yeah. Same.
translation.zh: 对 我也是

translation.en: Mind giving me a hand?
translation.zh: 不介意给我搭把手吧？

translation.en: Plus, if it's just you, what's the point, right?
translation.zh: 而且 如果只有自己那又有什么意义呢？

translation.en: [Jacob] Yeah, well, if it's any consolation, I've never had a tree,
translation.zh: 对 好吧 如果能安慰到你的话我还从没拥有过一棵树

translation.en: so you're ahead of me.
translation.zh: 所以你比我厉害

translation.en: [Scott] All right. Welcome to my humble abode.
translation.zh: 好了 欢迎光临寒舍

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: -Now just set this end down here. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -把这头放在这里-对

translation.en: [Scott] Can you tip it up?
translation.zh: 能把它立起来吗？

translation.en: -Gotta get the stand. -[Jacob] All right.
translation.zh: -我去拿架子-好

translation.en: -You live out here all alone? -I do!
translation.zh: -你一个人住在这里？-是的

translation.en: -All right. -[Jacob] Ellie painted that, right?
translation.zh: -好吧-那是埃莉画的 对吧？

translation.en: Good eye. Yeah, that's hers.
translation.zh: 好眼神 对 那是她画的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -I think that should do it. -[Jacob] Yeah?
translation.zh: -我觉得应该可以-嗯？

translation.en: -Look at that. -[Scott] Good job.
translation.zh: -你看啊-做得好

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -[Scott] Oh. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: [in background] Scott Turner. Hello?
translation.zh: 斯科特·特纳 喂？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Scott] See you then.
translation.zh: 到时候见

translation.en: [grunts] Sorry about that.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: That was, uh, one of my clients.
translation.zh: 是我的一个委托人

translation.en: -Your clients? What do you do? -I'm a social worker at the VA.
translation.zh: -你的委托人？你在做什么？-我是退伍军人协会的社工

translation.en: Social, you're trying to do some good in the world?
translation.zh: 你想在这世上试着做点好事？

translation.en: Underline "trying."
translation.zh: 重点是“试着”

translation.en: You know, I bought these forever ago when I first moved in,
translation.zh: 我搬进来的时候买了这些已经过了好久

translation.en: and I never even took them out of the box.
translation.zh: 甚至从没把它们从盒子里拿出来过

translation.en: Think they still work?
translation.zh: 你觉得它们还能亮吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: Jake…
translation.zh: 杰克

translation.en: I know an apology doesn't mean a whole lot after all these years… You know what? It's…
translation.zh: -我知道道歉没什么意义…-你知道吗？

translation.en: You can save it.
translation.zh: 那个省了吧

translation.en: I didn't come out here for a, uh, you know, reconciliation.
translation.zh: 我过来不是为了和解

translation.en: I'm only here to help a friend, honestly.
translation.zh: 老实说 我只是来帮朋友

translation.en: -A friend? -Yeah, a friend. It's a long story.
translation.zh: -朋友？-对 朋友 说来话长

translation.en: Well, since you're here, can I at least say what I've been waiting--
translation.zh: 既然你来了能让我至少讲些一直想说的话吗…

translation.en: I'd, I'd… I'd really rather you didn't.
translation.zh: 我…我真的希望你别说

translation.en: I am sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: [mutters] You're sorry.
translation.zh: 对 你很抱歉

translation.en: I am deeply, deeply sorry.
translation.zh: 我非常、非常抱歉

translation.en: Yeah. Good. Good. So we're all set then.
translation.zh: 对 很好 我们都准备好一吐为快了

translation.en: You know, um, you left me alone with Mom,
translation.zh: 你把我独自留给妈妈

translation.en: and then you run up here, and you just disappear altogether…
translation.zh: 然后跑到这里 就这么消失

translation.en: [shouts] And you're sorry?
translation.zh: 你很抱歉？

translation.en: God! I said I wasn't gonna do this.
translation.zh: 天啊！我说过不会这么做

translation.en: Uh, you know what? This was a mistake. I can't do this.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？这是个错误 我做不到

translation.en: -Jake! -Enjoy your tree.
translation.zh: -杰克！-好好欣赏你的树吧

translation.en: -Hey! -No, I can't handle this.
translation.zh: 我应付不来 我还以为这是个好主意

translation.en: -I thought this was a good idea. Let's go. -What?
translation.zh: 我应付不来 我还以为这是个好主意 -走吧-等等 深呼吸一下 好吗？

translation.en: Wait, just take a breath, okay? Take a breath.
translation.zh: -走吧-等等 深呼吸一下 好吗？

translation.en: You know, if you walk away now, that's it, right?
translation.zh: 如果你现在走开事情就这样了 对吗？

translation.en: It's over. Forever.
translation.zh: 永远地结束了

translation.en: -Well, it's been over for 35 years-- -Stop! Jake.
translation.zh: -已经35年了…-停 杰克！

translation.en: If you leave now,
translation.zh: 如果你现在离开

translation.en: you are doing exactly what he did.
translation.zh: 就是在做和他当年一样的事情

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Why don't you just try being the first adult in your family not to take the exit?
translation.zh: 你为什么不试着成为家里第一个不逃跑的大人？

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: [Scott] Jake, it's just so hard to talk about…
translation.zh: 杰克 这话很难说出口…

translation.en: but two days before Christmas,
translation.zh: 但就在圣诞节前两天

translation.en: we had the biggest snowstorm of the winter.
translation.zh: 我们遇到了冬季最大的暴风雪

translation.en: And Benji, like every year,
translation.zh: 本杰明和每年一样

translation.en: couldn't wait to hang his favorite ornament
translation.zh: 等不及去把他最喜欢的装饰物

translation.en: high up in the branches of our old elm tree.
translation.zh: 高高地挂到老榆树的树枝上

translation.en: He'd climbed up so many times to that platform that I'd built for you guys.
translation.zh: 他爬过很多次那个平台是我给你们做的

translation.en: [Scott] I knew the branches could be slippery…
translation.zh: 我知道树枝会很滑…

translation.en: but he was such a determined little guy.
translation.zh: 但他是个坚定的小家伙

translation.en: I thought, "I'll just let him hang the ornament."
translation.zh: 我心想：“就让他去挂那个装饰物吧”

translation.en: Now that you're here,

translation.en: you're welcome.

translation.en: Rachel.

translation.en: wonderful, she's amazing.

translation.en: Rachel.

translation.en: No, no, it's not that. It's just that I don't, um…
translation.zh: 不 不是那样的 只是 我…

translation.en: I don't know. Things are… We'll talk later, and it's…
translation.zh: 我不知道 事情…我们回头再说

translation.en: We're sorting things… sorting some things out right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在在解决一些事情

translation.en: "Sorting some things out"? I thought you guys made up.
translation.zh: “解决一些事情”？我以为你们和好了

translation.en: No, we-- We did, we just--
translation.zh: 我们之前是 我们只是…

translation.en: You know, things are a little up in the air right now.
translation.zh: 只是现在有些事不太确定

translation.en: This is starting to sound a little like that cigar engagement ring.
translation.zh: 听起来有点像那枚雪茄订婚戒指

translation.en: -Dad, stop. Seriously. -[phone vibrating]
translation.zh: 爸 别说了 真的

translation.en: Um, sorry, guys, one sec. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 抱歉 稍等一下 马上回来

translation.en: Jake, you've gotta stop calling. No, I'm not gonna stop calling until we talk.
translation.zh: -杰克 别再打电话了-不说清楚 我不会停止的

translation.en: [Rachel] I don't want to do this. Okay? I…
translation.zh: 我不想这么做 好吗？我…

translation.en: So I'm gonna just hang up the phone now.
translation.zh: 我现在要挂电话了

translation.en: Please don't try to find me, okay?
translation.zh: 请别再试着找我 好吗？

translation.en: Too late.
translation.zh: 太迟了

translation.en: Why are you doing this?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这么做？

translation.en: Do you really have to ask?
translation.zh: 你真的要问吗？

translation.en: I'm not coming out.
translation.zh: 我不会出来

translation.en: I'm not. I can't.
translation.zh: 我不会 我不能

translation.en: Why? Why not? What are you… What are you afraid of? What's gonna happen?
translation.zh: 为什么？为什么不？你怕什么？接下来会怎样？

translation.en: Jake, you don't understand.
translation.zh: 你不明白

translation.en: You don't. I have finally found something… that I can really…
translation.zh: 你不懂 我终于找到真正可以…

translation.en: I can really count on, and…
translation.zh: 真正可以依靠…

translation.en: It may not be perfect, but it's what I want.
translation.zh: 也许不完美 但那就是我要的

translation.en: It's what I need.
translation.zh: 那就是我需要的 好吗？

translation.en: So I need you to understand that.
translation.zh: 我需要你明白

translation.en: I do understand. I understand the whole thing.
translation.zh: 我知道 我完全明白

translation.en: I understand that…
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: what you may have needed before, you don't need anymore.
translation.zh: 你已经不需要以前需要的东西了

translation.en: Look at me, I… All I wanted my entire life was to be alone.
translation.zh: 看看我 我一辈子都只想孤身一人

translation.en: And it's hard for people like us to trust, right? To let people in.
translation.zh: 我们这种人很难相信别人对吧？让别人靠近

translation.en: It's hard. I understand that. But here I am, right here, right now.
translation.zh: 很难 我明白 但我现在就在这里

translation.en: And I am standing here with the only friend I have in the entire world.
translation.zh: 我和全世界唯一的朋友一起站在这里

translation.en: I'm staring at the woman that I love,
translation.zh: 我盯着我爱的女人

translation.en: and I'm begging you to trust me.
translation.zh: 求你相信我

translation.en: I'm telling you, you can trust me.
translation.zh: 听我说 你可以相信我

translation.en: Just let me in, please.
translation.zh: 让我进去吧

translation.en: Let me in.
translation.zh: 让我进去

translation.en: Tell me
translation.zh: 告诉我

translation.en: you don't love me.
translation.zh: 你不爱我

translation.en: Jake, that's Alan. You gotta go.
translation.zh: 艾伦来了 你得离开

translation.en: You tell me that you don't love me and I'll go.
translation.zh: 告诉我你不爱我 我就离开

translation.en: I don't love you.
translation.zh: 我不爱你

translation.en: Saw your truck, thought we'd pop by and wish you Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 看到你的车我们觉得该来祝你圣诞快乐

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Yes, I was packing up a few things, then I need to lock up, and then take off, so…
translation.zh: 我在收拾东西 上锁然后离开

translation.en: Would you care to join us for dinner? We'd love to have you.
translation.zh: 要一起吃晚餐吗？我们很乐意和你一起

translation.en: We really would. We're having a few people over.
translation.zh: 真的很乐意 还会有几个人过来

translation.en: It's Christmas dinner, all the trimmings.
translation.zh: 圣诞大餐 应有尽有

translation.en: I would, I would love to, and thank you, but I should take off before the roads get too slick.
translation.zh: 我很想去但我要赶在路面打滑前离开

translation.en: How did things go with your father?
translation.zh: 你父亲那边怎么样？

translation.en: Um, you know, they… Better than expected. Much better, actually.
translation.zh: 比预想的要好 其实是好很多

translation.en: -I told you. -You did.
translation.zh: -我就说吧-没错

translation.en: And Rachel and her mom?
translation.zh: 瑞秋和她妈妈呢？

translation.en: I think that's gonna work itself out.
translation.zh: 应该会船到桥头自然直

translation.en: That's very good news. Excellent.
translation.zh: 那是个好消息 很好

translation.en: Oh, bloody hell, I've gotta go baste the ham. You sure you can't stay?
translation.zh: 该死的 我要去卤火腿了你确定不能留下来？

translation.en: Well, Happy Christmas, old boy.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 大男孩

translation.en: -Happy basting. -[Ellie] I'll be right there.
translation.zh: -卤得愉快-我马上过去

translation.en: Come on in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: And you and Rachel?
translation.zh: 你和瑞秋怎么了？

translation.en: No? Really? I was so sure.
translation.zh: 没成吗？真的吗？我本来对你们有信心的

translation.en: Well, Kerouac said it.
translation.zh: 凯鲁亚克曾说过

translation.en: "It all ends in tears, anyway."
translation.zh: “无论怎样 一切都会以眼泪结束”

translation.en: But I'll be okay, and Rachel will be okay too.
translation.zh: 但我会没事的 瑞秋也会没事

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: For me? What did you do here?
translation.zh: 给我的吗？你画了什么呀？

translation.en: Oh, Ellie…
translation.zh: 哦 埃莉

translation.en: You put the… tree back in.
translation.zh: 你把…树画回去了

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I have wonderful memories of this house.
translation.zh: 我对这栋房子有美好的回忆

translation.en: You and Benji playing in the yard.
translation.zh: 你和本杰明在院子里

translation.en: Your folks.
translation.zh: 你的家人

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐

translation.en: -Take care. -Oh, you too. Take care of yourself too.
translation.zh: -保重-你也保重

translation.en: And thank you. This is just… You're special.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 这真的…你太特别了
